title: Headhunter Nidalee Bug
body: I played a game yesterday with a Nidalee with the Headhunter skin, and her spears and auto attacks were invisible. It wasn't invisible for me only, my team all agreed that the spears weren't showing up.

replies.body:
This is a known bug that Riot have put on the back-burner, as far as I'm concerned. It also happens with other champions and skins too, like Dr. Mundo's cleavers and Cassiopeia's poison cloud.

Bug reports belong [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
